inputFields.name: hostsFirst
inputFields.description: Order placing hosts first, followed by the provided or default sorting

inputFields.name: memberConnectionsFirst
inputFields.description: Order placing pending member connections awaiting the authenticated member first, if they are a subscriber, followed by the provided or default sorting

inputFields.name: sortField
inputFields.description: The field to sort on. Defaults to RsvpSortField.RSVP_ID

inputFields.name: sortOrder
inputFields.description: The direction of sort. Defaults to SortOrder.ASC
